nodes.text: Renée Ahdieh (born July 7, 1983) is the author of the short story "The Luckless Rodian," which was published in the 2017 anthology collection From a Certain Point of View.
She is the author of the bestselling young-adult fantasy novels The Wrath & the Dawn and The Rose & the Dagger. Renée is of mixed Korean-White descent and lives in Charlotte, North Carolina.
